text: James Parks (1843–1929) was a freed slave who is prominently buried in Arlington National Cemetery. James or Jim Parks may also refer to: * James Parks (actor) (born 1968), American actor * James C. Parks (1942–2002), American botanist and plant taxonomist * Jim Parks, Jr. (born 1931), the son, a batsman who became a wicket keeper * Jim Parks, Sr. (1903-1980), the father, an all-rounder ==See also== * James Park (disambiguation) * James Parkes (disambiguation) * James Parke (disambiguation)
title: James Parks (disambiguation)
